Research Areas

My research focuses on developing innovative algorithms for medical image analysis, computer vision, and machine learning, with particular emphasis in the following core areas:

Medical Image Analysis

Developing advanced deep learning algorithms for medical image processing, segmentation, and classification. Current focus includes:

  • Video domain adaptation for semantic segmentation
  • Synthetic data generation for model robustness
  • AI-driven medical imaging applications

AI for Security

Innovation in AI applications for security purposes through:

  • Object detection and tracking systems
  • Unauthorized mobile recording protection
  • Countering visual hacking with AI-driven solutions

AI in Robotics

Exploring deep learning models for robotics applications in:

  • Real-time action recognition and anomaly detection
  • Robust tracking in video systems
  • Deep learning for autonomous drones and robotics
